All Classes All Packages

A

addDocument(Document) - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: add a document and its words to the inverted index; INPUT: Document doc, the document to be added; RESULT: the inverted index is updated; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(n);

C

cleanContents - Variable in class SearchEngine
Set cleanContents, the set of words without the stopwords
contentsFlag - Variable in class SearchEngine
Boolean contentsFlag, the flag to turn on/off displaying file contents

D

display(Set<Document>) - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: display a set of documents' filenames, and if flag is true, the contents; INPUT: Set docSet, the set of documents to parse through; RESULT: the documents' filenames (and contents) are displayed to stdout; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(n);
displayAll() - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: display all pairs in the inverted index; INPUT: none; RESULT: the HashMap's key, value pairs are displayed to stdout; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(n^2);

I

invertedIndex - Variable in class SearchEngine
Map> invertedIndex, the map of key, value pairs

M

makeClean(Set<String>) - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: make a set of words not include any stopwords; INPUT: Set documentWords, the set of words that needs to be cleaned; RESULT: a set that contains no stopwords; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(n);
makeSingleWordClean(String) - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: make a single word clean, mostly used for words with apostrophes or other punctuation; INPUT: String word, the word that needs to be cleaned; RESULT: a word that does not include punctuation or stopwords; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(n);

P

processMultiWordQuery(Set<String>) - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: process a query made up of multiple words; INPUT: Set query, the set of words in the query; RESULT: the Set value corresponding to the intersection of the query words is returned; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(n);
processSingleWordQuery(String) - Method in class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: process a query made up of a single word; INPUT: String query, the word to be processed; RESULT: the Set value corresponding to the query is returned; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(1), HashMap 'get()' is usually constant;

S

SearchEngine - Class in <Unnamed>
 
SearchEngine(Boolean, String) - Constructor for class SearchEngine
PURPOSE: initialize the SearchEngine; INPUT: Boolean contents flag, the flag to turn on/off displaying contents; INPUT: String stoplistPath, the path to the stoplist file; RESULT: the initialized SearchEngine; EXPECTED TIME COMPLEXITY: O(1);
stoplist - Variable in class SearchEngine
StopList stoplist, the Stoplist object for this search engine
